name: oc_login_info
label: OpenShift Container Platform Login Information
description: Data structure describing connection details for an OpenShift Container Platform.

attributes.name: ocp_api_endpoint
attributes.description: Red Hat OCP API Endpoint URL used in oc login command. Example https://api.<>:<port>.
attributes.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform API Endpoint URL

attributes.name: ocp_user
attributes.description: Username for connecting to the Red Hat OCP using oc login command. Must provide token or user/password.
attributes.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform User Name

attributes.name: ocp_password
attributes.description: Password for connecting to the Red Hat OCP using oc login command. Must provide token or user/password.
attributes.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform User Password

attributes.name: ocp_token
attributes.description: Token for connecting to the Red Hat OCP using oc login command. Must provide token or user/password.
attributes.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform User Token

attributes.name: ocp_ca_cert
attributes.description: OCP certificate authority certificate to be used in oc login command
attributes.label: OpenShift Container Platform CA certificate (base64 encoded)
